name: Burn Fast || Die Hard // X23 Variant
description: Until recently, humans have existed in the debilitating haze of smug contentedness. Confident in their ability to shame individuals into erroneously taking personal accountability for the environmental disasters caused by corrupt conglomerates. 2560x2560. Collectors please contact me for 5000x5000 version. 'X23' variant of visual work for written piece at: https://affinitymatrix.network/burn-fast-die-hard/
